notConnected.title: Let's mint Joi's Nengajyo NFT
notConnected.description: First, we must connect our wallet.

connected.title: Connected!
connected.description: Now that our wallets are connected We can go ahead and mint the NFT.

afterMint.title: Minted!
afterMint.description: Success is sweet.  This NFT is now associated with this wallet, in effect your property.
afterMint.notice: Visit OpenSea.org to see it in your collection.
